lead_paragraph: KRONICK--Molly, 25 years old on May 24, 2016. Beloved daughter of Alice Brodie and Richard Kronick and sister of Sam Stark (Jemma Stait). Also survived by grandparents Sydney Kronick, Shirley Cohen, Frank Brodie and many uncles, aunts, cousins and friends. Predeceased by grandmother Annice Fript Kronick, grandfather Al Cohen and uncle Michael Kronick. In lieu of flowers, the family asks that donations in Molly's memory be made to the American Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (ASPCA.org) or Project Renewal (projectrenewal. org). With many thanks to the NYU Langone Medical Center, 15 West Medical ICU for their extraordinary care. Service Thursday, May 26, 11:15am at "The Riverside," 76 St. and Amsterdam Ave. 1/3
